title: How big is Texas in square miles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Area of Texas, 2nd largest state. Square miles is abbreviated sq mi. Square kilometers is written km2. Total268,581[1] sq mi (696,241 km2) • Land261,797[1] sq mi (678,051 km2) • Water6,784[1] sq mi (17,574 km2) 2.5% From [1] Texas Almanac cited in Texas - Wikipedia For comparisonAlaska, largest US stateTotal663,268 sq mi (1,717,856 km2) • Land571,951 sq mi (1,481,346 km2) • Water91,316 sq mi (236,507 km2) 13.77% California, 3rd largest stateTotal163,696 sq mi (423,970 km2) • Land155,959 sq mi (403,932 km2) • Water7,737 sq mi (20,047 km2) 4.7% Sources Alaska - Wikipedia California - Wikipedia
